partnerDetails.about:
EL KINDI ENGINEERING offers professional services in the engineering, manufacturing /procurement, construction testing and commissioning of electrical, instrumentation and automation systems.

EL KINDI ENGINEERING offers you a full support for your projects from field engineering to construction and commissioning, a strong partnership that will allow EL KINDI ENGINEERING to work with you as one team, all in order to lead your achievements to their good ends. 

In EL KINDI ENGINEERING, we cover all the disciplines of electrical engineering, instrumentation and automation according to Functional Work Breakdown Structuring (FWBS).

Our core services include:
  • Designs and technical solutions (engineering)
  • Field engineering
  • Construction works 
  • Commissioning of electrical, mechanical and instrument installation and packages
  • Technical assistance and advice
